Datatable.LocalizationPair: +0.1% [fidsi] on Systems per Original Empire Population in Empire

Pick the main appearance of your custom faction's original population. This will also define which main quest will be triggered, which hull will be available for the ship designs and which set of exclusive technologies you can research.
Unique icon representing this population. This icon may change in an actual game if another player picked it for his/her own custom faction's original population.
The original population with which your empire starts
Only the Original Empire Population can vote and Anarchy cannot happen, but changing government is impossible.
The original population with which this faction starts the game
when at least 1 Original Empire Population present
Original Empire Population within your empire.
Extract the genes of this population to include their effect to your original population. You need to reach a number of {0} population units to perform this action.
Consumes this population to include its Gene Splicing effects to your original population.
The effects added to your original empire population when this population's DNA is integrated.
Only the Original Empire Population can vote and Anarchy cannot happen, but changing government type is impossible.
Create 1 [population] of your Original Empire Population.
Due to a limited understanding of the reproductive mechanisms of the lesser populations that they oversee, breeding programs are less efficient than one would otherwise expect
Due to a limited understanding of the reproductive mechanisms of the lesser populations that they oversee, breeding programs are less efficient than one would otherwise expect
